name: Ruffwear Approach Pack
description: For carrying loads, 6 legs are better than 2. Outfit your dog for hiking and backpacking with Ruff Wear’s Approach Pack. Your 4-legged friend can help get gear from A to B.Weight forward saddle design comfortably distributes the load.Easy access stash pockets are great for frequently used items.Daisy chain webbing lets you expand the carrying capacity.5 points of adjustment ensure a snug and comfy fit.Integrated handle lets you help your dog into, or out of places. Note, lift only as high as your dog can safely jump, as the buckles are not strength-rated for high-angle rope work.Leashing points let you secure your pup.Sheltered buckles are easy to access and use with 1 hand.Reflective trim helps keep your best friend visible.Capacity: XS = 6L, S = 12.5L, M = 14.5L, and L/XL = 24L.
